alert.note: Alert for Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 4:40PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Washington County through 545 PM CST... At 440 PM CST, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near Fruitdale, or 10 miles southwest of Chatom, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chatom, Wagarville, Tibbie and Fruitdale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for southwestern Alabama.
